name: Pulmonary Artery Macros
description: This module describes the common data elements for flow in the pulmonary artery use case

attributes.name: Flow rate
attributes.description: Measurement of net flow volume in the pulmonary artery above the aortic valve  (mL/sec)

attributes.name: Maximum flow velocity
attributes.description: Measurement of maximum flow velocity in the pulmonary artery above the aortic valve (cm/sec)

attributes.name: Main artery diameter
attributes.description: Diameter of main pulmonary artery in mm, value step 0.1

attributes.name: Left artery diameter
attributes.description: Diameter of left pulmonary artery in mm, value step 0.1

attributes.name: Right artery diameter
attributes.description: Right pulmonary artery diameter in mm, step value 0.1

attributes.name: Diameter ratio
attributes.description: Main pulmonary artery to aortic diameter ratio MPAAo, value step 0.1

attributes.name: Flow ratio
attributes.description: Measurement of Qp-Qs ratio using aortic and pulmonary flow measurements, value step 0.1

attributes.name: Trunk diameter
attributes.description: Measure pulmonary artery trunk dimensions, value step 0.1

attributes.name: Segmental artery diameter
attributes.description: Defines dimensions of lobar and segmental pulmonary arteries, step value 0.1
